name: >observer_
description: What would you do if your fears were hacked? >observer_ is a cyberpunk horror game from Bloober Team, the creators of Layers of Fear. Play as an Observer, the new front line of neural police, as you hack into the jagged minds of the insane.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 (3.4 GHz) / AMD A8-7600 (3.1 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660 / AMD R9 270 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
